node_types.label: HumanActivity
node_types.description: Human actions that emit greenhouse gases (e.g., Fossil fuel combustion, Deforestation).

node_types.label: Emission
node_types.description: Instances or categories of greenhouse gas emissions.

node_types.label: GreenhouseGas
node_types.description: Individual greenhouse gases described in the text (CO2, CH4, N2O).

node_types.label: ClimateEvent
node_types.description: Observable climate change phenomena (e.g., Global warming, Sea level rise).

node_types.label: Metric
node_types.description: Quantitative indicators describing climate events (temperature, ocean heat, sea level).

node_types.label: RenewableSource
node_types.description: Energy sources reducing emissions (solar, wind, hydro).

node_types.label: Country
node_types.description: Countries or regions mentioned in connection with climate observations or agreements.

node_types.label: Agreement
node_types.description: International or national frameworks aimed at reducing climate change (e.g., Paris Agreement).

relationship_types.label: CAUSES_EMISSION
relationship_types.description: Human activity generates a specific emission.

relationship_types.label: DRIVES_EVENT
relationship_types.description: Greenhouse gas drives or contributes to a climate change event.

relationship_types.label: CHARACTERIZED_BY
relationship_types.description: Climate event is described by a metric such as temperature or sea level.

relationship_types.label: REDUCES_IMPACT
relationship_types.description: Renewable source lessens the intensity or likelihood of a climate event.

relationship_types.label: OBSERVED_IN
relationship_types.description: Climate event observed or measured in a particular country or region.

relationship_types.label: PARTICIPATES_IN
relationship_types.description: Country is a signatory or participant in an agreement.

relationship_types.label: TARGETS_EVENT
relationship_types.description: Agreement aims to limit or reduce a climate event.
